Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Reroute at Montrose/Western
ShortDescription: 78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted via Montrose, Western, Irving Park, California, and Montrose due to, street blockage at Montrose/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Montrose, Western, Irving Park, California, and Montrose due to, street blockage at Montrose/Western.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Monroe. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Monroe.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
